attributes.action: To force MPs voting for a No-Deal Brexit to stand immediately for re-election.
attributes.background: Britain voted to leave the EU: our MPs strongly agreed to start the Brexit process. Now 400 are trying to stop it by taking a No-Deal option off the table, so crushing democracy and the elective will of 17.4 m people. It is contempt: MPs voting for this must be forced into by-elections immediately.

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.
